verbs.description: Secretary of State Rex Tillerson [V: was] called to the White House after a furious President Trump reacted to reports of a growing rift between the two men .
[ARG1: Secretary of State Rex Tillerson] was [V: called] [ARG2: to the White House] [ARGM-TMP: after a furious President Trump reacted to reports of a growing rift between the two men] .
